skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: match of the day magazine
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The ultimate football quiz from BBC Match of the Day Magazine! Play in the Pro League or Sunday League. When you finish this weeks football quiz, you can play in practice mode.

Chose from any club in the Premier League, English Football League, Scottish Premiership or National League and score points for your team.

You can play for clubs like Liverpool, Man United, Man City, Arsenal, Chelsea, Tottenham, Everton, Leicester, Leeds, Newcastle, Aston Villa and over 100 more! 

The football quiz is five questions - with new questions every Tuesday.

*** LeaderBoard ***

Check out the league table to see where your team stands at:

https://leaderboard.motdmag.com/

You get 1 point for finishing the quiz. If you chose Sunday league you score two points for getting 4/5 and four points for 5/5. For the Pro league, it's three points for 4/5 and five points for 5/5. The league table resets every Tuesday … keep playing to move up!

*** Get in Touch with Us ***

If you have questions or suggestions to make the football quiz more fun, please contact us at freshthinking@voxlydigital.com. We can’t wait to hear from you!
priv:
